channel.title: Herblore? Potions..? [562]
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I noticed that the server i'm using doesn't have full herblore.. We cannot make Supers and Sara brews etc.. And also if i click the sara brew i spawned it doesn't drink it..
How2fix herby & Pot drinking?
thanks. Its 562 btw.
